disease_name: LMNA-related dilated cardiomyopathy (caused by mutations in the LMNA gene)
Desmin-related cardiomyopathy (caused by mutations in the DES gene)
Familial dilated cardiomyopathy (caused by mutations in various genes such as TTN, MYH7, or SCN5A)
Danon disease (caused by mutations in the LAMP2 gene)
Pompe disease (caused by mutations in the GAA gene)
